statements: SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY trigger_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT trigger_id, incident_id FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND trigger_timestamp <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_triggers FROM alarm_triggers
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_timestamp < '2021-06-30'
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(trigger_id) AS trigger_count FROM alarm_triggers GROUP BY incident_id ORDER BY trigger_count DESC
SELECT trigger_id, incident_id, trigger_timestamp FROM alarm_triggers WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT trigger_id, trigger_timestamp, incident_id FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY trigger_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM trigger_timestamp)) AS average_timestamp FROM alarm_triggers;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_id FROM alarm_triggers WHERE trigger_timestamp < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM alarm_triggers ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incidents WHERE description LIKE '%fire%';
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM incidents ORDER BY severity ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incidents WHERE location LIKE '%City%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM incidents WHERE severity = 5 AND location IN ('City A', 'City B');
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY location ASC, incident_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM incidents WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND location != 'City C';
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM alarm_triggers ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT responder_name, incident_name FROM incident_response WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp FROM alarm_triggers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM alarm_incident_mapping ORDER BY alarm_id, incident_id;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT incident_name, responder_name FROM incident_response WHERE incident_id > 100 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alarm_id, incident_id FROM alarm_incident_mapping WHERE incident_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY alarm_id ASC, incident_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_id FROM alarm_incident_mapping WHERE alarm_id = 5;
SELECT responder_name, response_timestamp FROM incident_response WHERE responder_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY response_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM incident_details;
SELECT incident_id, response_team FROM incident_response WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM incident_details WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM incident_resolution ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM incident_response WHERE response_team = 'Security';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM incident_details WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_resolution WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS resolution_count FROM incident_resolution GROUP BY incident_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM incident_response;
SELECT incident_id, response_team FROM incident_response WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, description FROM incident_details ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT alarm_name FROM alarm_types WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT team_name FROM response_teams WHERE team_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM alarm_triggers WHERE alarm_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, response_team FROM incident_response WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM incident_details WHERE location LIKE 'Los Angeles%' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT alarm_name FROM alarm_types WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM response_teams WHERE team_name IN ('Firefighters', 'Police') ORDER BY team_name DESC;
